aboutMe: As a Master of IT student at Monash University, I am deeply passionate about technology, especially in the areas of cloud computing, web development, and big data.
I am currently dedicated to enhancing my expertise in cloud computing, demonstrating my dedication to remaining at the forefront of technological innovation.

experience.title: New Product Introduction Engineer
description: Led design and process enhancements for 10+ in-vehicle info system products at Garmin, optimizing manufacturing efficiency and reducing failure rates.
Applied design for manufacturing principles, conducted process failure mode analysis and achieved a 15% cost reduction through strategic improvements.

certifications.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
certifications.issue: Amazon Web Services Training and Certification

portfolio.title: Automatic optimization analysis of prostheses for All-on-four treatments
description: Developed an automated framework for optimizing the placement of implants of the all-on-4 treatment based on the biomechanical analysis and optimization search algorithm.
Automatically ran HyperMesh and Abaqus by using Python scripts to improve analysis efficiency.

portfolio.title: Pet Planning: A pet care and management application
description: Developed an Android application to help pet owners schedule and manage events for their pets such as feeding, grooming, walking, or medical appointments.
The application synchronizes the data to the Room database and Firebase to ensure efficient data management and offline access to pet-related data.

portfolio.title: Image Taging: Serverless image storage system with tagging
description: Developed a cloud-based online system that enables users to store and retrieve images using automatically generated tags.
The system utilizes a cloud-based solution on AWS, leveraging services like S3, Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB.

portfolio.title: Asset Steward: A digital asset management system
description: Developed a digital asset management system that enables users to manage and track assets, including their location, status, and maintenance history.
The system is built on a web-based platform using React, Node.js.

Education.title: Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering
Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering
